main event: A large, bright light was observed descending from an object that appeared stationary at an elevation of about 120 degrees.
interesting points: The object did not disappear while the observer was watching.
The object appeared as a large, bright light with a white color.
The object was estimated to be between 5-10 inches in size from the observer's perspective.
No sound was reported from the object.
The observer could not estimate the speed or distance of the object.
